snippet: Student Opinion | Tell us what game you'd like to see redesigned, whether a board game, a game you play with others online, a classic video game, or even a centuries-old childhood game like hide and seek.
abstract: Student Opinion | Tell us what game you'd like to see redesigned, whether a board game, a game you play with others online, a classic video game, or even a centuries-old childhood game like hide and seek.
lead_paragraph: Have you ever played Dungeons & Dragons, the first commercially published role-playing game? What are your favorite games, online and off? If you were given the chance to redesign a game of any kind, as the hundreds of thousands of passionate "D&D" fans soon will be, what changes or updates would you recommend? Why?

headline.main: What Game Would You Like to Redesign?
